name: Blahaj The Braveheart
description:
Blåhaj The Braveheart is a 2D platformer adventure game where you play as 'Blåhaj' the famous IKEA shark, or Genomblot, the dolphin. As winter sets in, you begin your journey towards the south. With increasing environmental degradation, scary predators, and even humans, the challenge has never been more demanding. You will have to give it your all. Are you ready?

The game was programming in The Godot Game Engine ver. 3.2.1. The animated sprites were made in Aseprite.
